status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
TheNeuralBit opened a new pull request #2231: ARROW-2705: [JS] CombinationPredicates should take list of predicates
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2231
 
 
   `CombinationPredicate` now stores a list of child predicates rather than just a left and right
   Also adds `and`, `or` functions for easier creation of combination predicates with
   several children

trxcllnt commented on a change in pull request #2231: ARROW-2705: [JS] CombinationPredicates should take list of predicates
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2231#discussion_r210331305
 
 

 ##########
 File path: js/src/predicate.ts
 ##########
 @@ -256,6 +270,8 @@ export class CustomPredicate extends Predicate {
 
 export function lit(v: any): Value<any> { return new Literal(v); }
 export function col(n: string): Col<any> { return new Col(n); }
+export function and(...p: Predicate[]): Predicate { return new And(...p); }
+export function or(...p: Predicate[]): Predicate { return new Or(...p); }
 
 Review comment:
   Should these return types also be `And` and `Or` respectively, to match the definitions above?

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: CombinationPredicate like And and Or only take two predicates: left and right. However, it often makes sense to combine more than two predicates. I suggest that `and` and `or` support arbitrarily many arguments.
fields.summary: [JS] CombinationPredicates should take list of predicates
